sentences.en: A musician is an artist, whereas a singer is an artiste.
sentences.cn: 音乐家是艺术家而歌手是艺人.

sentences.en: Among the artiste appear on our show tonight we have.
Became a full - time artiste after being discovered by a television executive producer in 1999.
sentences.cn: 1999年被电视台监制发掘,后来成为全职艺人.

sentences.en: Every artiste should learn to be like her.
sentences.cn: 那时候所有人都劝她不要唱了,但她跟我说什么?

sentences.en: He's an artiste dedicated to the stage.
sentences.cn: 他是专注舞台演出的艺人.

sentences.en: Is there a guarantee I will be an artiste?
sentences.cn: 问:是不是能保证我一定会成为一位艺人?

sentences.en: Lau: In your career of being an artiste, what is your greatest happiness?
sentences.cn: 刘: 在你的艺术事业当中, 最大的快乐是什 麽 ?

sentences.en: Queen Productions is a Music Production and Artiste Management company for singers, musicians, actors and actresses.
sentences.cn: 皇后娱乐制作是一间集歌星, 音乐人及演员的综合式艺人管理及唱片公司.

sentences.en: She was a popular French music hall artiste in the late 19 th century.
sentences.cn: 她是19世纪后期在法国乐坛上名噪一时的艺术家.

sentences.en: Who are the training instructors for the artiste training course?
sentences.cn: 问:谁会是“星声代2006新人选拔赛”课程的老师?

sentences.en: With his career taking off, this artiste has much to shout about.
sentences.cn: 随著他的事业起飞, 这位设计梦想家也有很多令人[惊声尖叫]的作品等著问世.

sentences.en: Wu Zun : I never expected to become an artiste so I did not like either much.
sentences.cn: 吴尊 ﹕ 我从来没料想到自己会成为艺人所以我两样都不是很喜欢.

sentences.en: Wu Zun : I never expected to become an artiste so I didn't like either much.
sentences.cn: 吴尊 ﹕ 从来没料想到自己会成为艺人所以我两样都不是很喜欢.

sentences.en: Yes, there is a course fee involved for the artiste training course.
sentences.cn: 答:是的! 艺人培训课程是需要付费.

trans.tran_cn: 职业表演者，艺人，<谑>（擅长某手艺的）能手，大师
trans.tran_en: An artiste is a professional entertainer, for example, a singer or a dancer
